param.name: title
param.label: Title %s
param.description: Input the title to display as the tabs title.

param.name: description
param.label: Description
param.description: Optionally input the description to describe this tabs purpose on profile edit. Note some plugin tabs may render this on profile view.

param.name: enabled
param.label: Publish
param.description: Select the publish state of this tab.

param.name: ordering
param.label: Profile Ordering
param.description: Select the profile view ordering of this tab. This ordering is specific to the tabs position.

param.name: ordering_edit
param.label: Edit Ordering
param.description: Select the profile edit ordering of this tab. This ordering is not specific to the tabs position.

param.name: ordering_register
param.label: Registration Ordering
param.description: Select the registration ordering of this tab. This ordering is not specific to the tabs position.

param.name: position
param.label: Position
param.description: Select the profile view position for this tab.

param.name: displaytype
param.label: Display Type
param.description: Select how to display this tab on profile view.

param.name: viewaccesslevel
param.label: Access Level
param.description: Select the view access level for this tab. Only users with this view access level will be able to access the tab on profile view and profile edit. Tab will still show on registration regardless of access if it has fields displayed on registration.

param.name: cssclass
param.label: CSS Class
param.description: Optionally input the CSS class added to this tab and its tab content. Separate multiple CSS classes with a space.
